getCountries.description: Returns countrycodes and their translated names.

countrycodes.description: Limit the result list to the specified country.

languagecodes.description: Return the results in this language.

offset.description: Where in the resulting list to start. This can be used together with {rows} to get the data in parts.

rows.description: The maximum number of entries to return. This can be used together with {offset} to get the data in parts.

getCities.description: Returns list of cities (with some translations).

city_ids.description: Limit the results to these cities.

countrycodes.description: Limit the result list to the specified country.

new_hotel_type.description: Returns new hotel type IDs. For a full list of new hotel IDs, refer to New Hotel Types.

show_hotel_themes.description: Adds hotel theme information to the response. A set of theme (id,name) pairs is included for each result.

show_test.description: Also include information from test hotels (useful for debugging).

last_change.description: Limit the results to all data that has been changed since this date (see also getChangedHotels).
